content:
Mcap MediaWire
 
Tue, Feb 28, 1:03 PM (2 days ago)
 
to me, Erwin, Mark

Jeff:

 

GREAT NEWS!!! 

 

As you know, my principal working load is the daily operation and tech side. 

 

I believe I can develop a great Networking Project but asking you for helping hands in creating the presentation. 

 

Let me explain: 

 

Project: Increasing of Mcap Network Endpoints together with a Monetization Option. 

 

Project A: 

 

Name: THE MICRO CAP OBSERVER – Weekly Newsletter for public listed Micro Cap Corporation 

 

Initial Cost: Domain Name reservation, Host and one or two business emails, Phone Number 

Planned dominion name: http://themicrocapobserver.com/ 

Planned Logo: 

 
Monthly cost: USD 150.00 (1 Site) down to USD 125.00 (Bulk Sites) for Software License 

 

Monetization: Banner/Advertisements sold by Mcap, Google Ads, and other third-party Ad Sellers 

 

Project B: 

 

Name: Bulk WordPress News Sites (5 sites for every 30 days, 20 sites for the next 120 days, 60 sites for the next 12 months. 

Initial Cost: Domain Name reservations, Host and one or two business emails, Phone Number 

Planned principal dominion name: http://www.mcapmediagroup.com/ 

Example: Affinity Group Publishing - A Global Publishing Network 

Sub dominion name for each site (Example:) http://www.mcapmediagroup.com/technews (technews is only an example) 

Site Example: 24/7 Business Reporter (247businessreporter.com) 

 

All sites will be having the same Template but different Logos and Colors. 

 

This is a simple Import/export of steady RSS FEED Content starting first with Mcap but also offering this option as BULK for Content delivery provided from third-party Wire Services or Marketing/IR Firms. 

All sites are planned to be created to accept Multimedia Content as we actually deliver with RSS FEED to ARGUS Journal with Social Media Share Gadget. 

 

The bulk Price per site development will be USD 250.00 (including initial integration of RSS FEED Import/Export with 5 minutes updates). If we agree on 5 Sites monthly for the next 12 months, I could get us the price down to $225.00 per site. This included Website Development and Creation. We may have additional Host Fees, but smaller than 300 to 400 USD monthly and for all sites. 

 

Any additional cost in need from the Web developer would be $15.00/Hour. 

 

Monetization: Banner/Advertisements sold by Mcap, Google Ads, and other third-party Ad Sellers 

 

Project C: 

 

Closing Network Partnership with COMTEXT to Increase Syndication of our RSS FEED. Based on a first calculation, the cost per Submission would be around $26.00 and include important Syndicate Endpoints where COMTEX is exclusive. 

 

Regards,

 

Thomas Wolff

COO

 

 

(707) 682-9473

 

cs@mcapmedia.com

tw@mcapmedia.com

https://www.mcapmediawire.com

@McapMediaWire | Linktree

 

Follow Mcap MediaWire : Instagram Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Youtube

 

DISCLAIMER: CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE TO RECIPIENT

This email (including attachments) is covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. §§ 2510-2521, is confidential and may be legally privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any retention, dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender, and delete it immediately.

 

 
De: Jeff Palumbo 
Enviado: Tuesday, February 28, 2023 10:43:52 AM
Para: Erwin Pena ; Mcap MediaWire ; Mark Newbauer 
Asunto: Capital
 
Looks like we have agreed to terms for a possible closing next week for the capital in MCAP and MCAP will be public. This deal is an loi and not contracted or closed. However the terms are currently agreed to by both parties. 

To this end, I would like to put together an action plan for the first 30 and the next 120 days. I would like to know from you anything that you think should be included in that plan or things you need to have addressed during that period for you to be more successful.

Please include anything you feel is important and needs to be accounted for and acted upon for your job and for the company overall. Any high level details you can provide on each item is appreciated, please include soft or hard costs if you know them. 

Exiting new chapter for us ahead. 

Jeff Palumbo 
...

[Message clipped] View entire message
Mcap MediaWire
 
AttachmentsTue, Feb 28, 1:58 PM (2 days ago)
 
to me, Erwin, Mark

Jeff: 

 

Please see attached the potential sales volume for the planned weekly/monthly Newsletter 

 

To be honest. This is copied from another Rate Offer. Of course, Fee rates can be changed or text can be deleted or added. 

 

I want only to show the potential of selling Advertisement Space. 

 

We have around 200 registered Clients in the publicly listed Micro Cap Space, and almost all on OTC. There is also a huge Market Niche called NASDAQ and NYSE Nano and Micro Caps.

 

I have a planned Conference with the Software Licenser to discuss the potential Adverdicement Spaces available. This is more a tech talk and not closing of Cooperation.

 

Regards, 

...

[Message clipped] View entire message
 One attachment • Scanned by Gmail
Jeff Palumbo 
 
AttachmentsTue, Feb 28, 2:54 PM (2 days ago)
 
to Mcap, Erwin, Mark
We are going to be launching dozens of new destination vertical news websites. Hope you have ideas on how to monetize that. Let me know your thoughts.. 
 4 Attachments • Scanned by Gmail
Mcap MediaWire
 
Tue, Feb 28, 3:04 PM (2 days ago)
 
to me, Mcap, Erwin
Absolutely-- enhanced dissemination add-ons, company ads/banners for sale, I'll put together some ideas we've discussed in the past
Best, 

Mark B. Newbauer
President/Founder
Follow Mcap MediaWire : Instagram Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Youtube

 

DISCLAIMER: CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE TO RECIPIENT

If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender, and delete it immediately.
Mcap MediaWire
 
Tue, Feb 28, 3:05 PM (2 days ago)
 
to me, Erwin, Mark

Jeff:

 

The idea is selling Ad spaces to our clients. The Weekly planned News Letter will included OTC Pinks, OTCQB, NASDAG and NYSE Section with around 10 to 20 subcats per Category.

 

There will be always the option to get Google Ads on the site with signed of a Referal Program with the Software Group who in fact has more tan 100 online and printed Newsletter on their Server.

 

FYI: the License fee for the Weekly planned Newsletter will be 150 monthly down to 125 if we purchase 5+ Licenses.

 

This are the Example Sites

 

https://www.miningnewsnorth.com/ (look Ads on the right part)

https://www.metaltechnews.com/ (look Ads on the right site)

 

Same Software License. Cost for both Site = $250 monthly (as this is a Group who working with 5+ Lincenses/News Sites)

 

Best regards,
...

Best, 

 

Mark B. Newbauer

President/Founder
